description: This course, designed for students who want to heighten their drawing skills, emphasizes
using expressive qualities of drawing by investigating various media, techniques, and content.
Assignments are both traditional and nontraditional within historical and contemporary perspectives.
Experimentation is encouraged. Students are encouraged to develop a personal visual language.
The course culminates in the production of a series of drawings that relate thematically. Critical
thinking and discussion skills are important. Prerequisites: Art 102 or 111 and 112 (or 110), and
